title: 求助搬运求生之路MOD

replies.txt_content: 别看我，我不会，。请大师去吧

replies.author: rtrrpanda
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 rtrrpanda 于 2012-3-10 21:29 编辑 

Note to the people linked here via gaming websites: This is *not* a mod. It is a adventure map with a custom skin. No coding has taken place, and there is no need to mess with the .jar files. Hope that clears up some of the confusion I've been seeing!

这上面不是写 这不是mod 吗？ 这是一个地图 with custom skin. 这根本不是mod 是adventure map！！！
而且上面给你的下载地址根本用不了:(
